message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's valued at $1500000 and I believe it will be a valuable asset for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1750000. This price reflects its quality and potential. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1600000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $1600000 just yet. I believe the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1650000. This is a fair price considering the value and potential of this product.  I'm open to discussing this further.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1580000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm willing to compromise to get a deal done.
